DOC.brief_summary: A cluster randomize control trial perform Bogotá , Colombia 2007-2008 evaluate effect opportunistic ( hospital-based ) screen program ( intervention ) vs. usual care ( control ) 26 clinic randomize intervention ( N=13 ) control arm ( N=13 ) . At intervention clinic general practitioner instruct perform clinical breast examination ( CBE ) woman age 50-69 year attend clinic non-breast health relate issue , refer mammographic screening . Physicians control clinic specifically instructed perform breast-screening refer woman mammography , could think appropriate ( 'usual care ' ) . Women follow 2 year post-randomization .
DOC.criteria: Female Aged 5069 Resident Bogotá , Colombia surround city ; Had mammogram previous two year ; No history breast cancer Attending healthcenters reason unrelated breast health see
